testcase.name: Complete User Journey - Search to Results › should complete full search flow: type locations → search → see results
Bus List Interactions › should expand bus row and show stops when clicked
Bus List Interactions › should show map with stops markers when bus is expanded
Sorting Features › should sort buses by different criteria
Sorting Features › should highlight active sort option
Edit Search and Refetch › should allow editing search and fetch new results
Additional User Scenarios › should handle no results gracefully
Additional User Scenarios › should filter buses by type if filter available
Additional User Scenarios › should show bus details like fare, duration, stops count
Application Connectivity › should load the application successfully
Application Connectivity › should display search inputs on homepage
Application Connectivity › should allow user interactions
Application Connectivity › should not have critical console errors
Search and Results Flow › should display search form on homepage
Search and Results Flow › should allow typing in search inputs
Search and Results Flow › should show location suggestions when typing
Search and Results Flow › should handle empty search gracefully
Search and Results Flow › should work on mobile viewport
Search and Results Flow › should preserve search inputs when navigating
Simple E2E Tests › page loads successfully
Simple E2E Tests › search inputs are visible
Simple E2E Tests › can type in search inputs
Simple E2E Tests › works on mobile viewport
Basic Smoke Tests › should load the homepage
Basic Smoke Tests › should be responsive on mobile
Basic Smoke Tests › should work across different browsers
